subject: Request to refund order SSN5831 as it is not shipped yet
description_text: The order #SSN5831 (Simsonn HS PRO Shifter) shipping number SF6047227116079 shows not exists over 7 days.     I would like to request to cancel the order as it is not shipped after one week.     Order number: SSN5831  Product: Simsonn HS Pro shifter  Buyer email: Shop with chenqu@qq.com  shipping info: SF6047227116079 (Shows not receive item after one week)

conversations.body_text: Hi Q Chen,  I sincerely apologize for the delayed response.Due to the New Year holiday and the subsequent surge in orders, a significant backlog of unprocessed emails has resulted in delayed responses. We extend our deepest apologies once again. Your order was shipped on the 14th, so we cannot cancel it for you.  You can track your shipping information via the following link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047227116079
